Package com.bomber7.core.controller

Class Config

java.lang.Object
com.bomber7.core.controller.Config
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Config extends Object implements Serializable
Config class is used to manage the configuration settings for the game. It allows setting and getting key bindings for player controls. The configuration can be saved to a file.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Config

      public Config(String fileString, int up, int down, int left, int right, int dropBomb, int activateBomb)
      Constructor for the Config class. Initializes the configuration with default key bindings.
      Parameters:
      fileString - The path to the configuration file.
      up - The key for moving up.
      down - The key for moving down.
      left - The key for moving left.
      right - The key for moving right.
      dropBomb - The key for dropping a bomb.
      activateBomb - The key for activating a bomb.

    • loadConfig

      public static Config loadConfig(String configFile)
      Class method to load the configuration from a file.
      Parameters:
      configFile - the path to the configuration file.
      Returns:
      the Config object loaded from the file, or null if an error occurs.
